title: US special envoy on Afghanistan calls on FM Jilani
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 07 (APP): The United States Special Representative on Afghanistan Thomas West on Thursday called on Caretaker Foreign Minister Jalil Abbas Jilani here.
In the meeting, the foreign minister underscored the importance of collective approaches to promote prosperity and development for the people of Afghanistan.
He reaffirmed Pakistanâ€™s commitment to work with international partners to this end, a Foreign Office statement said.
